Subject: Tumi, Vilebrequin, Kenzo Kids and Kids Around Staff Sale, How to Cope with Collective Grief & Uncertainty, Coffee with Wassim, Skincare Reset & L'Occitane, Elemis, Erborian and Sol de Janeiro Staff Sale!
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/uvR0bnE0I0GfEu8hUguvpw/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/uvR0bnE0I0GfEu8hUguvpw/550443/51646C7536588CF3B1361AA3D2159AC0/chalhoub-sports-day-11.gif> 	

TUMI, VILEBREQUIN, KENZO KIDS & KIDS AROUND STAFF SALE


Shop up to 80% off on Tumi, Vilebrequin, Kenzo Kids and Kids Around!

Location: D3 Building 9 - R06

Date and time: 
- 1st & 2nd October 10am - 6pm
- 3rd October 10 am - 3pm


Open to family & friends. Happy shopping!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/uvR0bnE0I0GfEu8hUguvpw/545165/89D49CDE2A1BF478CAB98F9F126897A6/nuggets-06.png> 	

HOW TO COPE WITH COLLECTIVE GRIEF AND UNCERTAINTY

In light of the current crisis unfolding in Lebanon, The Lighthouse Arabia are offering an online support session on Thurs, October 3rd at 3pm (UAE time) led by trauma expert, Farah Dahabi.

chunks.text:
In light of the current crisis unfolding in Lebanon, The Lighthouse Arabia are offering an online support session on Thurs, October 3rd at 3pm (UAE time) led by trauma expert, Farah Dahabi. The session is designed to provide trauma-informed guidance and support for those impacted.You will receive an invite from the internal comms email in your inbox tomorrow.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/uvR0bnE0I0GfEu8hUguvpw/550424/CF5E8D29C2B42402E901B4605EA02CEA/wellbeing-webinars-squares-1-1.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/uvR0bnE0I0GfEu8hUguvpw/545187/D2B7C565CA630A68BC201F481E7A3E59/nuggets-38.png> 	

COFFEE WITH WASSIM THIS WEDNESDAY

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/uvR0bnE0I0GfEu8hUguvpw/549526/A5C1F5BF9EA98D8C1FB106234C15E0EB/coffee-with-the-presidents-08-1.png> 	
Join Wassim Eid - President of People & Culture for an informal, open hour to network, ask questions, share your thoughts, and connect through meaningful and transparent conversations!

Wednesday, October 2nd from 3 - 4 pm at D3, The Library.

Secure your spot to join us.

RSVP NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fform.jotform.com%252f230361379788468%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWVtL2oRbJ7RnLOZ%252b%252fIbjGfn1fl5blZWOlvcl5vcYXjUH%252bebBuEGQO8C5qarvcThzvmE9dhYf0%252bTTffV9%252fNH0AoKTXXmBp%252ff0y%252b2sSD%252fh0Lk7e%252bnwjVZeo3E4Uz9EG%252frq6V1fHvj%252bc51JEO3Xx61hPXWQgPQsOF%252fYNa2eVEg5JJCF5Qnbf1JllR0ZnqIAfyjclRM3kPQvWsFOwmGRcGOqXhhwqfJSbs%252fwAJn5yKKYGIVq&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C35c03bc06f3344449a3e08dce1500a61%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638632981196961401%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ZUuV2Q1Iwt71CFZl4%2BSImUA35F2jpnI5o2cyC5%2F5HH4%3D&reserved=0>
